00034 W.wait = function(millis){
00035     date = new Date();
00036     var curDate = null;
00037     do{
00038         var curDate = new Date();
00039     }while(curDate-date < millis);
00040 };

00055 W.test = function(pred, title){
00056     ++this.numCases;
00057     if(typeof pred == 'string')
00058         pred = confirm(pred);
00059     this.mesg += '<li>Testing "'+ title +'" . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . ';
00060     if(!pred){
00061         ++this.numErrors;
00062         this.mesg += '<font color="red"><b>[failed]</b></font></li>';
00063     }else this.mesg +='<font color="navy"><b>[passed]</b></font></li>';
00064 };

00075 W.Timer = function(){var self = this;
00076     var startDate, pauseDate;
00077     this.pausedTime = 0;
00078     this.start = function(){
00079         W.mesg += 'Test started on '+ (new Date) +'<ul>';
00080         this.startDate = new Date;
00081     };
00082     this.finish = function(){
00083         var elapsedTime = (new Date) - self.startDate - self.pausedTime;
00084         W.mesg += '</ul>';
00085         if(W.numCases != 0)
00086         if(!W.numErrors){
00087             W.mesg += '<font color="navy"><b>Congratulations!  It passed all '
00088                          + W.numCases +' test case(s).</b></font><br>';
00089         }else W.mesg += '<font color="red"><b>Sorry.  It failed at '+ W.numErrors
00090                               +' test case(s).</b></font><br>';
00091         W.mesg += 'Finished in '+ (elapsedTime / 1000) +' second(s).<br><br>';
00092         W.mesg += '<a href = "javascript:history.back()">Go back </a><br><br>';
00093 
00094         // set target message panel
00095         var target = document.getElementById('_wednus_wps_');
00096         if(target == null){
00097             // print queued message
00098             document.open();
00099             document.write(W.mesg);
00100             document.close();
00101         }else{
00102             //W.mesg += '<a href = "javascript:(function(){var a = document.getElementById(\'_wednus_wps_\'); a.style.display=\'hidden\';})();">Close </a>&nbsp;';
00103             target.style.display = 'block';
00104             target.innerHTML = W.mesg;
00105         }
00106 
00107         // flush out
00108         W.mesg = '';
00109     };
00110     this.pause = function(){
00111         this.pauseDate = new Date;
00112     };
00113     this.resume = function(){
00114         self.pausedTime += (new Date) - this.pauseDate;
00115     };
00116 };
